remarks: The transfinite recursion function is set-like if the input is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2019.)
statement:
tfrexlem.1 $e |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } $.
tfrexlem.2 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ( Fun F /\ ( F ` x ) e. _V ) ) $.
tfrexlem $p |- ( ( ph /\ C e. V ) -> ( recs ( F ) ` C ) e. _V ) $.
$d A f x y $.
$d F f x y $.
